name: Join the Party
description:
...Dancefloor, orgy or battle?

It was ment to be a black&white AND a color painting ; each side of the wood panel was painted following the same protocol, to be rotated on a pole quite fast... 

Then I imagined it as a 3 walls installation of projected .gif with loud oscillators modulating in rythm... 

But in the end it's here, as a psychedelic, epileptic, harmfull .gif!


paintings, gif
